CardStorage

Class FileSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardStorage.FileSaver

  • public class FileSaver
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to save register to a file. The save format is legible to FileLoader. This class uses the string ">#>#>#:::" to separate information fields from each other. Different cards aren't separated by any other thing than the number of fields. That is: even empty content is written to the file.
    See Also:
    FileLoader
